freetext: .LARGE NUMBER OF CORRECTIONS INCLUDING-
INCREASE IN NEUTRON PATH LENGTH BY SCATTERING IN THE
GOLD (1.0 PERCENT FOR SMALL SHELL, 2.0 PC FOR LARGE).
SCATTERING IN COPPER BACKING (2.8 PC FOR BOTH SMALL
SHELLS, 11.8 AND 8.4 PC FOR LARGE).
ROOF SCATTERING BACKGROUND (NEGLIGIBLE FOR SMALL,
2.9 PERCENT FOR LARGE).
AIR-SCATTERING BACKGROUND (NEGLIGIBLE FOR SMALL,
0.5 PERCENT FOR LARGE).
SCATTERING IN ALUMINIUM CAN ROUND LARGE SHELLS
(0.5 PERCENT).
SMALL SHELLS AFFECTED BY CONTAMINATION FROM THE
SOURCE (3 PERCENT AND 0.7 PERCENT).
RESONANCE SELF-PROTECTION (LESS THAN 0.1 PERCENT).
NEUTRON COMPONENT OF ENERGY 380 KEV (3.3 PERCENT).
NO CORRECTION FOR COMPTON SCATTERING OF 1.69 MEV
GAMMAS IN THE SOURCE PRODUCING EXTRA NEUTRONS.
NO CORRECTION FOR INELASTIC SCATTERING OF SOURCE
NEUTRONS FROM 20 KEV SB LEVEL.
SMALL CORRECTION FOR SOURCE POSITIONING IN ONE CASE.
4-PI BETA PROPORTIONAL COUNTER TO COUNT BETA
ACTIVITY OF THIN FOILS. DETECTOR CALIBRATED
BY RE-IRRADIATING THE FOILS IN A REACTOR AND
COUNTING IN A 4-PI BETA/GAMMA COINCIDENCE
ARRANGEMENT.
GAMMA SPECTROMETER TO MEASURE GAMMA ACTIVITY
OF THICK SAMPLES RELATIVE TO A VERY THIN HIGH
ACTIVITY AU-198 SAMPLE WHICH WAS ABSOLUTELY
CALIBRATED IN A 4-PI BETA/GAMMA COINCIDENCE
ARRANGEMENT. ALLOWANCE MADE FOR DIFFERENCES
IN SAMPLE GEOMETRIES.
RANDOM ERROR.
SYSTEMATIC ERROR.
TOTAL ERROR.
.NONE.
SB-BE PHOTONEUTRON SOURCE MADE AT AWRE
CONSISTING OF SOLID SPHERE OF ANTIMONY
1.75 CM IN DIAMETER WITH A CLOSELY FITTING
BERYLLIUM SHELL 3.00+-0.02 MM THICK.
SOURCE STRENGTH (6.46+-0.04)E+05 N/SEC AT START
OF IRRADIATIONS AND CALCULATED USING SB-124
HALF-LIFE OF 60.2+-0.3 D THEREAFTER.
ACTIVATION. ONE WEEK IRRADIATIONS ON ROOF
OF NPL.
DECAY BETAS.
DECAY GAMMAS.
.TWO MATCHED PAIRS OF THIN HEMISPHERICAL SHELLS, ONE
SET FITTING EXACTLY ROUND THE SOURCE, THE OTHER OF
RADIUS 10 CM.
.AFTER IRRADIATION BACKING WAS DISSOLVED AND GOLD
MELTED TO MAKE DISCS (0.75 INCH DIAMETER, 0.005 INCH
THICK, OR 1.5 INCH DIAMETER, 0.17 INCH THICK) FOR
GAMMA COUNTING AND FOILS (0.875 INCH DIAMETER, 0.001
INCH THICK) FOR BETA COUNTING.
